text:
Profile of Mizanur Haque  Page 1 
                          MIZANUR  HAQUE, AITP         
  
A Brief Profile  -------------------------------------------------- -------------------------- 
                                                                                                                                                                                        
Personal Information  : 
 
Date of Birth  : 6th February ,1979 | Sex & Material Status  : Male & married | 
Qualification  : B.SC Geography (Hons), CSJMU, M.SC (Geography), , AITP [Master 
in Town Planning] Institute of Town Planners India (ITPI), New Delhi | Computer 
literacy  : Operating system windows, Auto CAD, MS Office etc.   I Height  : 5’6” with 
sound physique. 
 
Professional Experience : 
 
Presently, working as ‘Programme Officer’  Mega Cit y Association (MCA) [is a non-
profit , national –level organization registered by  the Municipal Commissioner of 
seven mega cities of India with support from Minist ry of Urban Development 
,GOINDIA, USAID,ICMA & UI] . The post assigned with  : 
To co-ordinate efforts to professionalize urban man agement and further 
strengthen city governance through training and bui lding the capacity of city 
officials. 
To conducts workshop, seminar, exchange and exposur e visit, as well as research 
and documentation of innovative practices. 
Sharing of knowledge appropriate practices among th e Urban Local Bodies (ULB) 
will go a long way in step up the quality of manage ment practices in the sphere of 
governance. 
To share the success stories with various stakehold ers connected with city 
governance.  
To build a  data base to be accessed by the ULBs to  find solution of the problems of 
urban development.  
 
Profile of Mizanur Haque  Page 2 
 Areas of strength include  : 
 
 Active professional with experience of working with  urban sphere  
 Masters degree in Urban Planning related field from  leading National ( ITPI, New 
Delhi) 
 More then  8 years working  experience in Urban Loc al Bodies (ULB) level  urban 
poverty/urban planning including social   planning  and development planning 
 Sharp of community mobilization process, community participation in 
development programmes 
 Knowledge of master plans and regional plans 
 Good teamwork skills, able to function in a multi-f unctional/ agency working 
environment  with concern and respect for diversity  
 Capability to work with, motivate/ train Government  staff 
 Dedication to perform any other related tasks as ma y be assigned by a supervisor 
authority/ others 
 Excellent written and oral communication skills in Bengali, English & Hindi.  
  
 Refresher Courses   : 
 
Attended Short Term in-Service Training courses spo nsored by Govt. of INDIA & 
Govt. of West Bengal like Managing Changes for Urban Local Bodies, Planning &  
Dev elopment in Peri / fringe Urban Areas, Urban Manage ment & Governance 73 th  & 
74 th  Constitutional Amendment Act (CAA ) at Urban Management Centre, (UMC) , 
Administrative Training Institute ( ATI) , Govt. We st Bengal. 
 Jawarlal  Nehru National Urban Renewal Mission  (JNNURM), Basic Urban 
services for the Poor (BUSP) Training at ILGUS Bhav an, and Livelihood Promotion 
for Urban Planners  at ILGUS Bhavan, Govt. of West Bengal.  
Service Level Benchmarking for Municipal Services a t Urba n Management Centre, 
(UMC) , Administrative Training Institute ( ATI) , Govt. West Bengal. 
Presented a paper in the seminar on Urban Planning and Management With 
Special Reference to West Bengal  on 12 th January, 2008 at the Centre for Urban 
Economic Studies (CUES), Department of Economics, U niversity of Calcutta. Training 
on Urban Risk Reduction Programme  at ILGUS Bhavan, Govt. West Bengal. 
Demonstrate a lecture on  ‘Realistic  approach on better delivery of SWM’  at Urban  
Management Centre, Administrative Training Institut e (ATI), GoWB , Dec,2012. 
 
 Profile of Mizanur Haque  Page 3 
  
 
 
Assignment held and Performance  
 
 Urban Planner  : Preparation of Draft Development Plan ( Bansberia Municipality, Hooghly, 
WB ) covering a period of five years  and fringe ar ea Development Strategy  as Thesis case 
study .(2006-2013) 
 
 Plan Coordinator :  in absence of Executive Officer for Minority Devel opment works (2008) at 
Bansberia Municipality 
  Nodal  Officer   : for preparing BPL list (2007)  
 Convenor  :  for Environmental Committee, (2008)  
 'Presiding Officer :  for Panchayet Election (2008) 
 Additional Charge Officer & Master Trainer   : for Census work (2011)  
 External Examiner :  for Seasonal Examinations in Quantity Survey for f inal year Diploma of 
Survey Engineering (DSE) students of Technique Poly technic Institute ,Panchrokhi, Hooghly, 
West Bengal. 
 
 Additional Charge Officer & Associated Designated O fficer   : Socio-Economic & Caste Census, 
2011 under Bansberia (M) Charge. 
 
 Nodal Officer  : Rajib Awas Youjana (RAY), December , 2013 , at Bans beria Municipality 
 
 
Contact Details    :  
 
Permanent Address:  Village +P.O-Subsit, P.S- Bagnan, District –Howrah , PIN-
711303.West Bengal. 
Mobile  No - +91 9836197185. 
Email Id :haquemizanur@gmail.com ,  mijanur07@rediffmail.com   
 
           Sd/ - 
            (MIZANUR HAQUE)
